rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, exile the top card of your library. When you do, if you own four or more cards in exile, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control and it gains deathtouch until end of turn.
notes:
Art: AI (Low rez image, use original)

RG Suspend, Cares about exile
GW +1/+1 Counters
